# MPSMatrixDecompositionStatus | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Metal Performance Shaders ](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders)

-  MPSMatrixDecompositionStatus 

Enumeration# MPSMatrixDecompositionStatus

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOS

```
enum MPSMatrixDecompositionStatus
```

## [Topics](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSMatrixDecompositionStatus#topics)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSMatrixDecompositionStatus#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case failure`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdecompositionstatus/failure)A status indicating the decomposition was not able to be completed.[`case nonPositiveDefinite`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdecompositionstatus/nonpositivedefinite)A status indicating a non-positive-definite pivot value was calculated.[`case singular`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdecompositionstatus/singular)A status indicating the resulting decomposition is not suitable for use in a subsequent system solve.[`case success`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdecompositionstatus/success)A status indicating the decomposition was performed successfully.### [Initializers](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSMatrixDecompositionStatus#Initializers)

[`init?(rawValue: Int32)`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdecompositionstatus/init(rawvalue:))## [Relationships](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSMatrixDecompositionStatus#relationships)

## [See Also](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSMatrixDecompositionStatus#see-also)

### [Classes for Decomposition and Solving](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSMatrixDecompositionStatus#Classes-for-Decomposition-and-Solving)

[`class MPSMatrixDecompositionCholesky`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdecompositioncholesky)A kernel for computing the Cholesky factorization of a matrix.[`class MPSMatrixSolveCholesky`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixsolvecholesky)A kernel for computing the solution of a linear system of equations using a Cholesky factorization.[`class MPSMatrixDecompositionLU`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixdecompositionlu)A kernel for computing the LU factorization of a matrix using partial pivoting with row interchanges.[`class MPSMatrixSolveLU`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixsolvelu)A kernel for computing the solution of a linear system of equations using an LU factorization.[`class MPSMatrixSolveTriangular`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixsolvetriangular)A kernel for computing the solution of a linear system of equations using a triangular coefficient matrix.[`class MPSMatrixUnaryKernel`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixunarykernel)A kernel that consumes one matrix and produces one matrix.[`class MPSMatrixBinaryKernel`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrixbinarykernel)A kernel that consumes two matrices and produces one matrix.
